title: Chicken liver pâté with apple and walnut chutney
description: This smooth-as-silk, prepare-ahead pâté is a delicious starter with which to wow your guests.
ingredients: 250g/9oz chilled butter, plus extra for greasing
1 tbsp fresh marjoram or thyme leaves
salt and freshly ground black pepper
450g/1lb Bramley apples, peeled, cored and roughly chopped
